title: PBE
body: So i got an email today saying i got into Pbe which got me excited, but when i click on the create my acc button it says application received. It wont let me get to step 3. Anyone else have this? pls help

replies.body: Same happened to me. I sent in a ticket yesterday but they still didn't reply. Waiting for answers/fix.

I took a look at your account and it seems it was *permanently suspended*. This may be why you're encountering issues accessing the PBE page, since accounts that have been suspended typically won't get PBE access. 

Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like additional context around this and/or your suspension.
